item.title: Need Help, Spawn to Eco
item.dc:creator: @Inception-X Inception-X
item.description:
@Inception-X wrote:

I am running disturbed source/client, and i am pretty sure my server should be admin+ to spawn… but it isn’t? im not sure if it has something to do with other files that might have spawning coded in them,
but here is my ;;item command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item")) { if (cmd.length < 2) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "Use: ;;item id (optional:amount)"); return true; } int itemId = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]).intValue(); try { player.getInventory().addItem( itemId, cmd.length >= 3 ? Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]).intValue() : 1); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "Use: ;;item id (optional:amount)"); } return true; }

And when i compile/start server, make a new account to test, it is still normal player spawning, help me please!
and thankyou.

add me on skype if it’s easier!!
SKYPE: aquarium_mate
Im: Chris on there

Read full topic
